objects.name: Analytic 0155
objects.description: Detection of malicious certificate installation via monitoring execution of the `security add-trusted-cert` command and modifications to system keychains.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of /usr/bin/security add-trusted-cert or keychain modifications to System.keychain

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:osquery
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: query: Enumeration of root certificates showing unexpected additions

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Commands related to certificate management (e.g., security, profiles) that can be tuned per environment.
Baseline of expected certificates in System.keychain to reduce false positives from legitimate enterprise certificates.
